content: everyday pullover a design by raya budrevich www blissfulknits com a simple but with bold results top down sweater design features a circular yoke with a drop stitch design and single row striping matching striping for sleeve cuffs and bottom hem creates additional visual effect pattern instructions are indicated for the smallest size with larger sizes appearing in parentheses if there are no parentheses the instruction applies to all sizes to make those instructions easier to read the sizes are identified by distinct colors it s strongly encouraged that you read through the entire pattern before starting required skills basic knitting techniques stitch needles & accessories increases and decreases lace knitting - size us 7 16 circular * - size us 7 dnps for working sleeves * sizes - darning needle 6 months 12 months 18 months 2t - scrap yarn 4t 6 8 - 8 stitch markers * or size to obtain gauge measurements chest 16 5 19 21 23 25 8 27 7 29 5 basic abbreviations inches underarm circumference bobble bind off suggested ease loose fitting 1 co cast on positive ease k/p knit/purl kfb knit into the front and back of a stitch materials m1 raised increase - lift yarn between yarn spud & chloë - worsted 55% stitches and knit into loop superwash wool/45% organic cotton pm/rm/sm place marker/remove 160yds per 100grams marker/slip marker color a main 1 1 2 2 3 3 4 pu pickup stitch color b trim 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 st s stitch es sl slip_stitch knitwise gauge 18 stitches and 26 row in a 4x4 swatch collar with size 7 needles and main color a co 48 56 56 56 64 64 64 sts pm and join to knit in the round work a k2 p2 ribbing for 5 rounds sm * k 6 7 7 7 8 8 8 pm repeat * a total of 7 times k 6 7 7 7 8 8 8 yoke assume all markers are slipped as you come to them round 1 - b sm sl1 k6 8 times round 2 - a k all sts round 3 - b sl1 yo k to next marker yo 8 times round 4 - a k all sts when knitting into a yo stitch twist the stitch to close the hole repeat rounds 1-4 4 5 6 7 8 9 10 more times 128 152 168 184 208 224 240 sts work round 3 one more time body blissful knits & dyeworks august 2011 2 version 1 1 with main color a rm k to next marker rm k to next marker rm k1 co 2 sts begin to slip sts to scrap yarn rm continue to slip sts until marker rm twice 70 82 90 98 110 118 126 sts on needles after this division you should have two slices per sleeve two slices for the front and two slices for the back the slip_stitch columns along edges of the sleeves
